title: 138. Zconomy & Post-Pandemic Consumer Trends
description: In this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron sits down with Jason Dorsey, an acclaimed keynote speaker and the author of Zconomy. Barron and Dorsey explore the ins and outs of Generation Z, and how this demographic may play a key role in the recovery of businesses across the country.
